Vehicle.Name: Republic Z-95 Headhunter
Vehicle.Description: [H3]Republic Z-95 Headhunter[h3] [P]A joint venture between Incom and Subpro, the Z-95 is the Republic Navy’s primary multi-role starfighter. The Z-95 Headhunter was designed specifically for the Navy to take advantage of clone pilots’ physical and mental capabilities. It is fast and agile, while its proton torpedo launchers give the fighter a punch well out of proportion to its size. So successful has the Z-95 Headhunter been, that Incom engineers have already begun work on a mass-market variant, and plan to use the design as the basis for future projects.
